p: Biofilm formation capacities of tested strains and biofilm inhibition percentages of the extract against these three test strains are given in Table 2, Table 3 respectively. According to the results given in Table 3 the extract presented 3% and 5% antibiofilm activity for 50 µL.mL −1 and 100 µL.mL −1 of the extract respectively against S. epidermidis (strong biofilm formation).
